item.description:
I found myself in possession of a Scrabble board and want to try it out.

Join me for a game! I'm relatively new to Scrabble, so I don't know all of those weird three letter words like "DEX". This will be a low-key, non-competitive game.

I've capped this meetup at four "YES" RSVPs, but will add more slots if anyone else can bring a board too.

When you sign up, PLEASE TELL ME IF YOU CAN BRING A BOARD TOO!

We'll be meeting at one of our favorite local hangouts: Newport Tea and Coffee at 7pm on Thursday.


Adam
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the guy with the scrabble board. Cell: 401-699-7304
item.name: Scrabble!
